unnormalised: **Traffic Chaos in Delhi? New Rules Incoming!**
normalised: **Traffic Chaos in Delhi? New Rules Incoming!**

unnormalised: Folks, Delhi traffic's a bigger mess than my chai spilling this morning! But hold onto your helmets, 'cause the Delhi Traffic Police is cracking down with new regulations, expected next week.
normalised: Folks, Delhi traffic's a bigger mess than my chai spilling this morning! But hold onto your helmets, 'cause the Delhi Traffic Police is cracking down with new regulations, expected next week.

unnormalised: Dr. Mehra, Commissioner of Transport, announced stricter enforcement on speeding and signal jumping. Fines are going up, possibly reaching Rs. 5000 for repeat offenders. They're also focusing on lane discipline near AIIMS and Dhaula Kuan – good luck with *that*!
normalised: Doctor Mehra, Commissioner of Transport, announced stricter enforcement on speeding and signal jumping. Fines are going up, possibly reaching rupee five thousand for repeat offenders. They're also focusing on lane discipline near A I I M S and Dhaula Kuan – good luck with *that*!

unnormalised: Plus, new rules for parking are coming up. Forget about casually parking in front of Sharmaji's shop; new designated parking zones are being planned with monitored time limits and heavy fines for unauthorized parking, especially near Connaught Place. Apparently, some areas will be designated as no-parking zones altogether.
normalised: Plus, new rules for parking are coming up. Forget about casually parking in front of Sharmaji's shop; new designated parking zones are being planned with monitored time limits and heavy fines for unauthorized parking, especially near Connaught Place. Apparently, some areas will be designated as no-parking zones altogether.

unnormalised: Reportedly, the Government plans to add more CCTV cameras covering around 2000 sq ft in busy stretches to monitor traffic violations. Let's hope this eases the daily commute, otherwise, we're all stuck chanting "Om Shanti Om" in traffic forever!
normalised: Reportedly, the Government plans to add more C C T V cameras covering around two thousand square feet in busy stretches to monitor traffic violations. Let's hope this eases the daily commute, otherwise, we're all stuck chanting "Om Shanti Om" in traffic forever!
